verses.verse: שִׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this פָּר֤וֹת <S%H6510><s%> ye kine הַבָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> that [are] in the mountain שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria הָעֹשְׁק֣וֹת <S%H6231><s%> which oppress דַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor הָרֹצְצ֖וֹת <S%H7533><s%> which crush אֶבְיוֹנִ֑ים <S%H34><s%> the needy הָאֹמְרֹ֥ת <S%H559><s%> which say לַאֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H113><s%> to their masters הָבִ֥יאָה <S%H935><s%> Bring וְנִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> and let us drink

נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> The Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD בְּקָדְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6944><s%> by his holiness כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> that lo the days בָּאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> shall come עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> upon וְנִשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> upon you that he will take you away אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּצִנּ֔וֹת <S%H6793><s%> with hooks וְאַחֲרִיתְכֶ֖ן <S%H319><s%> and your posterity בְּסִיר֥וֹת <S%H5518><s%> hooks דּוּגָֽה׃ <S%H1729><s%> fish

וּפְרָצִ֥ים <S%H6556><s%> at the breaches תֵּצֶ֖אנָה <S%H3318><s%> And ye shall go out אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> every נֶגְדָּ֑הּ <S%H5048><s%> straight וְהִשְׁלַכְתֶּ֥נָה <S%H7993><s%> [cow at that which is] before her and ye shall cast הַהַרְמ֖וֹנָה <S%H2038><s%> [them] into the palace נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

בֹּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> Come בֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel וּפִשְׁע֔וּ <S%H6586><s%> and transgress הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> at Gilgal הַרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> multiply לִפְשֹׁ֑עַ <S%H6586><s%> transgression וְהָבִ֤יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and bring לַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> every morning זִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2077><s%> your sacrifices לִשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> after three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> years מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4643><s%> [and] your tithes

וְקַטֵּ֤ר <S%H6999><s%> And offer מֵֽחָמֵץ֙ <S%H2557><s%> with leaven תּוֹדָ֔ה <S%H8426><s%> a sacrifice of thanksgiving וְקִרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaim נְדָב֖וֹת <S%H5071><s%> the free offerings הַשְׁמִ֑יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> [and] publish כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> for this אֲהַבְתֶּם֙ <S%H157><s%> liketh בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> you O ye children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנִי֩ <S%H589><s%> I נָתַ֨תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And I also have given לָכֶ֜ם נִקְי֤וֹן <S%H5356><s%> you cleanness שִׁנַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8127><s%> of teeth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָ֣רֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> in all your cities וְחֹ֣סֶר <S%H2640><s%> and want לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מְקוֹמֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4725><s%> in all your places וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7725><s%> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> to Me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore אָנֹכִי֩ <S%H595><s%> I מָנַ֨עְתִּי <S%H4513><s%> And also I have withholden מִכֶּ֜ם <S%H4480><s%> at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגֶּ֗שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> the rain בְּע֨וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> from you when [there were] yet three חֳדָשִׁים֙ <S%H2320><s%> months לַקָּצִ֔יר <S%H7105><s%> to the harvest וְהִמְטַרְתִּי֙ <S%H4305><s%> and I caused it to rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city אֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> upon one וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> upon another לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אַמְטִ֑יר <S%H4305><s%> and caused it not to rain חֶלְקָ֤ה <S%H2513><s%> piece אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> one תִּמָּטֵ֔ר <S%H4305><s%> was rained וְחֶלְקָ֛ה <S%H2513><s%> upon and the piece אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַמְטִ֥יר <S%H4305><s%> whereupon it rained עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> on תִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> not withered

וְנָע֡וּ <S%H5128><s%> wandered שְׁתַּיִם֩ <S%H8147><s%> So two שָׁלֹ֨שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [or] three עָרִ֜ים <S%H5892><s%> cities אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> unto one לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to drink מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׂבָּ֑עוּ <S%H7646><s%> but they were not satisfied וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7725><s%> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> to Me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

הִכֵּ֣יתִי <S%H5221><s%> I have smitten אֶתְכֶם֮ <S%H853><s%> בַּשִּׁדָּפ֣וֹן <S%H7711><s%> you with blasting וּבַיֵּרָקוֹן֒ <S%H3420><s%> and mildew הַרְבּ֨וֹת <S%H7235><s%> increased גַּנּוֹתֵיכֶ֧ם <S%H1593><s%> when your gardens וְכַרְמֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H3754><s%> and your vineyards וּתְאֵנֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H8384><s%> and your fig trees וְזֵיתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2132><s%> and your olive trees יֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> devoured הַגָּזָ֑ם <S%H1501><s%> the palmerworm וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7725><s%> [them] yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> to Me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

שִׁלַּ֨חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> I have sent בָכֶ֥ם דֶּ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1698><s%> among you the pestilence בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> after the manner מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הָרַ֤גְתִּי <S%H2026><s%> have I slain בַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword בַּח֣וּרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H970><s%> your young men עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> along שְׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> and have taken away סֽוּסֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5483><s%> your horses וָאַעֲלֶ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> to come up בְּאֹ֤שׁ <S%H889><s%> and I have made the stink מַחֲנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H4264><s%> of your camps וּֽבְאַפְּכֶ֔ם <S%H639><s%> unto your nostrils וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7725><s%> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> to Me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

הָפַ֣כְתִּי <S%H2015><s%> I have overthrown בָכֶ֗ם כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֤ת <S%H4114><s%> overthrew אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> [some] of you as God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סְדֹ֣ם <S%H5467><s%> Sodom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמֹרָ֔ה <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah וַתִּהְי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> were like כְּא֖וּד <S%H181><s%> and ye were as a firebrand מֻצָּ֣ל <S%H5337><s%> plucked out מִשְּׂרֵפָ֑ה <S%H8316><s%> of the burning וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7725><s%> yet have ye not returned עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> to Me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

לָכֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Therefore thus will I do לְּךָ֖ יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> unto thee O Israel עֵ֚קֶב <S%H6118><s%> [and] because כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> I אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> I will do לָּ֔ךְ הִכּ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> this unto thee prepare לִקְרַאת־ <S%H7125><s%> to meet אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> O Israel

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold יוֹצֵ֨ר <S%H3335><s%> For lo he that formeth הָרִ֜ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וּבֹרֵ֣א <S%H1254><s%> and createth ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind וּמַגִּ֤יד <S%H5046><s%> and declareth לְאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> unto man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what שֵּׂח֔וֹ <S%H7808><s%> what [is] his thought עֹשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that maketh שַׁ֙חַר֙ <S%H7837><s%> the morning עֵיפָ֔ה <S%H5890><s%> darkness וְדֹרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1869><s%> and treadeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בָּ֣מֳתֵי <S%H1116><s%> upon the high places אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> The God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name ס
